text: Suvrat was an amazing colleague who demonstrated great proficiency in computer vision development, electronic controls design, and system integration. His attention to detail and dedication to clear, concise documentation of his work helped set him apart. His contribution was critical to the development of a machine learning processing chain for the complex, multi faceted, system prototype we developed together over the past year.

Working with Suvrat on a technically challenging project over the course of a year showed his outstanding capabilities and talents. Suvrat is easy to work with, articulate in his conversation and writing, has a logical approach to solving problems, and is a self-starter who pays attention to the details.
